pr_title: Convert Map<Unit, TotalPowerAndTotalRolls> into an instance of TotalPowerStrengthAndRolls

timeline.message:
Convert Map<Unit, TotalPowerAndTotalRolls> into an instance of TotalPowerStrengthAndRolls

Split AA logic and non-AA logic into two separate classes with a common
interface. AaPowerStrengthAndRolls is for AA logic and
PowerStrengthAndRolls is for non-AA logic. TotalPowerAndTotalRolls is
the common interface.

Correct terminology of power, strength, and rolls in methods and variables.

timeline.bodyText: I'd rather not grab the Map since I want that to be internal to PowerStrengthAndRolls but I didn't want to make too much change to this code at this point.
timeline.author: trevan

timeline.bodyText: This logic is copied from TotalPowerAndTotalRolls.  Oddly enough, getAttackAaMaxDieSides also checks if it is less than 0 and if so, it returns the gameData.getDiceSides().
